name: I'm Tryin' to Get the High Score, But My Normie Boyfriend Just Wants a Regular Date With Me!
name_original: I'm Tryin' to Get the High Score, But My Normie Boyfriend Just Wants a Regular Date With Me!
description:
Ichiko is a pretty cool gamer who's aiming for the highest score on Magetrix, but her boyfriend, Aoto, just wants to go on some boring date at the Cafe! Can you help Ichiko deal with her normie boyfriend?

Character graphics by Noraneko; music and sound by Joshua McClean, RMN Music Pack 2, Panic Pumpkin, Maou Damashii, and TAM Music Factory.
